item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 542: The Enlightened Mind | Part 5 of The Dalai Lama's Guide to Happiness
item.description: Speaker 1 Cows are sacred, so there are cows all over the street just chilling and nobody bothers them. This is the 10% Happier Podcast. I’m Dan Harris. item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 541 Is Reincarnation Real Part 4 of The Dalai Lama's Guide to Happiness
item.description: Speaker 1 So this is security where we go check in. This is the 10% Happier Podcast. I’m Dan Harris. Pretty soon they’ll be bringing in a huge delegation of people who will have what’s called Speaker 3 an audience Speaker 1 with his holiness. Every morning, except on Sundays, the Dalai Lama holds a public audience at his compound with fans and followers. These audiences are hushed affairs, despite the bustle of the crowd, everybody’s patiently working their way through the long line, then they approach the Dalai Lama in small groups and have their pictures taken and

item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 540: Wise Selfishness | Part 3 of The Dalai Lama's Guide to Happiness
item.description: Speaker 2 He’s already laughing. This is the 10% Happier Podcast. I’m Dan Harris. Okay, so today is the big day. I’ve been in Dharamsala for over a week and it is finally time for my sit down with his holiness, the Dalai Lama. I have flown across the world for this one hour audience, so the stakes feel pretty high. I will admit, I’m a little nervous. His holiness can be a bit of a tough nut to crack.

item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 539: The Cake Incident | Part 2 of The Dalai Lama’s Guide to Happiness

item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 538: The Dalai Lama’s Guide to Happiness | Part 1
item.description: Speaker 1 This is the 10% Happier Podcast. I’m Dan Harris. Speaker 8 Deep the Isles clear of all carry-on items. Speaker 1 Hey gang, it’s New Years, and we’re making a pretty radical departure from our usual format. Thanks, Speaker 8 thank you for choosing American Airlines. I Speaker 1 recently flew with a small team to Daram Salah, India, home to his holiness, the Dalai Lama. Speaker 4

item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 537: Your Chance for a Do-Over| Bonus Meditation with Oren Jay Sofer
item.description: Speaker 1 Before we get started with today’s show, I want to tell you about something really awesome that we’re doing around here. Back in October, I flew to India to spend a few weeks in Dharamsala. That’s a small city nestled at the foot of the Himalayas surrounded by beautiful cedar forests. It’s also home to Tenzin Gyatso, who you probably know as the 14th Dalai Lama. He has claimed that the purpose of life is to be happy.

item.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris - 536: How Not to be Owned by Your Cravings | Bonus Meditation with Alexis Santos
item.description: Speaker 2 This show is sponsored by BetterHelp. Wouldn’t it be nice if life came with a user manual? Anytime you have a problem, just check the table of contents, go to the right page, follow the instructions and voila problem solved. But we all know that it doesn’t work that way. Navigating any of life’s challenges can make you feel unsure whether it’s a career change, a new relationship, or becoming a parent.
